name: Kiro (itch) (João Ribeiro)
description:
Adventures like you never seen, 4 unique worlds to be uncover, get ready!

What on past were peace and quiet, now there is destruction and chaos, until the aperance of a hero that changes the history. Kiro is the name of that hero has the main objective to control the 4 basics elements (earth, water, fire and wind) that were uncontrolled until his apperance.

Main Features:
  • Single gun:  The player only have a single gun, but this gun has 4 types of bullets (water, wind, fire and earth) that he has to use depending on the need.
  • Unique gameplay: The game will provide different types of puzzle witch has not a unique solution, so diferent players will have different gameplays deppending on the ways of each one thinks.
Controls:

Kiro is compatible with most standard computer keyboards and mouses. 

W A S D Basic Movement Mouse1 Shoot C Crouch Space Jump 1 Change bullet element (1) 2 Change bullet element (2) 3 Change bullet element (3) 4 Change bullet element (4) More Information:
